name: LD41 Ghost Job
description:
Use Arrow Keys to Control the Ghost.

Try to scare the Visitors to your house by using the 1, 2, 3 and 4 keys. They each set off a trap  that will scare the visitor when they get in its range (the red square). Each Scare has a different range, cooldown and length of effect.

You cannot lose this game, in fact all you can do is scare the visitors, and win the game. I did not have time to put the Lose scenario.

Have fun, looking forward to everyone's feedback.
